snippet: William R. Berkley will have the title of chair-designate until October 2015, when he will officially succeed Martin Lipton.
abstract: New York University names insurance industry executive William R Berkley as chair-designate for its board of trustees.
lead_paragraph: William R. Berkley will have the title of chair-designate until October 2015, when he will officially succeed Martin Lipton.

headline.main: New Chairman of Board at N.Y.U. Is Announced
headline.print_headline: New Chairman of Board at N.Y.U. Is Announced
